channel.title: L4D2 Server Mods
channel.description: Hello. I was looking to add some mods to my Left 4 Dead 2 server. But can't really find any good ones. Does anybody have any suggestions or links that they can post here to some good server side mods for Left 4 Dead 2?

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: Grum
item.description:
Soviet:

Get Metamod

Download and install the latest snapshot

Look through these

Infected Release Mod
Pouncedamage++
L4D Custom Player Stats
Zombie Character Select (ZCS)
Gun Control
Score/Team Manager
Character Select Menu (CSM)

I recommend those.

This helps. Thanks dude, and thanks to those who were willing to help.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: Soviet
item.description:
Get Metamod

Download and install the latest snapshot

Look through these

Infected Release Mod
Pouncedamage++
L4D Custom Player Stats
Zombie Character Select (ZCS)
Gun Control
Score/Team Manager
Character Select Menu (CSM)

I recommend those.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: Bobikan00sh
item.description:
Grum:

I wasn’t being an asshole. Don’t have a freak out man. He obviously thought I was some sort of retard, and I was simply pointing out to him that he is wrong. Also I Hate Mountains is an addon custom map. That’s cool and all, but i’m looking for mods. Not maps.

my bad man.

p.s. after all, i’m the only one who can consistently look like an asshole

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
there was one for L4D1 (then again that was Left 4 Dead, not Left 4 Dead 2) that replaced the Assault rifle and pump Shotgun with the M41-A Pulse Rifle
Here’s a useful site.
https://www.l4dmods.com
EDIT
Dammit, it looks as if they’re doing maintenance

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Cameron :smiley: :

Then why are you asking for mods? That will give you them all.

He doesn’t want all of them, he wants the good ones and that’s something that is a little harder to google search. Personally I don’t like mods in my l4d so I don’t know any.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: Grum
item.description:
Bobikan00sh:

here is a great idea.
try being less of an asshole when you’re the one asking for help^_^

other then that i would look into the i hate mountains campaign. they just added l4d2 support to it so when it comes out it will work with your server. also heard its supposed to be very fun

EDIT: its already out so there you go.

I wasn’t being an asshole. Don’t have a freak out man. He obviously thought I was some sort of retard, and I was simply pointing out to him that he is wrong. Also I Hate Mountains is an addon custom map. That’s cool and all, but i’m looking for mods. Not maps.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: Grum
item.description:
Like some sort of stats mod and an admin mod of some type. Maybe a mod that lets you change your skin to the original survivors or one of those roll the dice mods. Some mods along those lines.

item.title: L4D2 Server Mods
item.dc:creator: joker
item.description:
Don’t put mods; they sucks, most of the time i join a modded server, the mod is like a cheat, or whatever and it pisses everyone so we finish by changing server, when people join servers, the want to play what they want, not with some shitty mods like infinite ammoes or no spec zombies,etc.

Read full topic
